mapper.sql: id, name, decription, pay_name, pay_times, trad, payType, punishType, punishTrad, mostMon, payObj, remark, create_time, update_time, create_per, update_per,record_status
mapper.select: select * from t_common_ggdm ggdm1 where ggdm1.dm= #{pay_name,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ggdm1.dmjbh='payType'
select * from t_common_ggdm ggdm2 where ggdm2.dm= #{punishType,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ggdm2.dmjbh='fxfs'
select * from t_common_ggdm ggdm3 where ggdm3.dm= #{payObj,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ggdm3.dmjbh='payobj'

select count(1) cnt from t_product
where name like #{filter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_product (id, name, decription, pay_name, pay_times, trad, payType, punishType, punishTrad, mostMon, payObj, remark, create_time, update_time, create_per, update_per,record_status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{payTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trad,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{paytype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{punishtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{punishtrad,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{mostmon,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payobj,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatePer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
name,

mapper.update:
update t_product
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decription = #{decription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_name = #{payName,jdbcType=CHAR},
pay_times = #{payTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trad = #{trad,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
payType = #{paytype,jdbcType=CHAR},
punishType = #{punishtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
punishTrad = #{punishtrad,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mostMon = #{mostmon,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payObj = #{payobj,jdbcType=CHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_per = #{createPer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_per = #{updatePer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_status = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_product set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, decription = #{decription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_name = #{payName,jdbcType=CHAR}, pay_times = #{payTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trad = #{trad,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, payType = #{paytype,jdbcType=CHAR}, punishType = #{punishtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, punishTrad = #{punishtrad,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, mostMon = #{mostmon,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payObj = #{payobj,jdbcType=CHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_per = #{createPer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_per = #{updatePer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_status = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
